name: Ricky Iwasaki na ɔkyerɛwee
title: Software ho Mfiridwumayɛfo
summary: Software Developer a ɔwɔ osuahu, a ɔrehwehwɛ hokwan foforo a ɔde bɛyɛ adwuma ama nnwuma akɛse. N’ani gye ho sɛ ɔbɛbɔ anaa ɔde code bɛka ho ama afoforo de adi dwuma. Megye di sɛ m’ahokokwaw sua sɛ wɔde toto intanɛt ho a, enti m’ani gye ho yiye sɛ mede nnwinnade afoforo, nnwuma, nhyehyɛe kasa bɛyɛ adwuma.

experience.title: Software Mfiridwumayɛfo
experience.location: Irvine, California, U.S.A., na ɛwɔ hɔ
responsibilities: Ɔyɛɛ wɛb aplikeshɔn a wotumi sesa no ho nhyehyɛe na ɔde dii dwuma denam React ne Node.js so
Wɔne nneɛma so ahwɛfo yɛɛ biako de siesiee ahwehwɛde ahorow na wɔhwɛɛ sɛ wɔde bɛkɔ bere ano
Wɔyɛɛ RESTful APIs na wɔhwɛɛ so maa wɛb aplikeshɔn
Wɔyɛɛ script ahorow a ɛbɛma nnwuma ayɛ adwuma wɔ ɔkwan a ɛyɛ adwuma so na ama adwumayɛ atu mpɔn

Asɛdeɛ a ɛfa agodifoɔ a wɔwɔ abɔnten so no ahobanbɔ ho, titire agofoɔ nkumaa ne wɔn a wɔanyinyin, te sɛ wɔn a wɔadi mfeɛ 3 ne wɔn a wɔadi mfeɛ 60
